caseTitle: Agro Tractor (Pvt.) Limited v. Facto Belarus Tractors Limited and others
tagline: The procedure of the grant of permission to import tractors at zero rated duty suffered from arbitrariness, excessive jurisdiction, favoritism, lack of transparency, subjectivity and was also not in accordance with the decision of Economic Coordination Committee; therefore, the principles of promissory estoppel were not attracted in the facts and circumstances of the case.
